observation: [{'url': 'https://www.reddit.com/r/AirForce/comments/58rkx4/has_anyone_ever_used_clearancejobscom_after/', 'content': "I'm getting out after my 6 years and was planning on becoming a full time student, but I will have 4 years left on my TS clearance and it'd be a shame to waste it.
